botan.pubkey.workfactor

Public Key Work Factor Functions

License:

size_t dlWorkFactor(size_t prime_group_size);
Estimate work factor for discrete logarithm

Params:
size_t prime_group_size size of the group in bits

Returns:
estimated security level for this group
